title: Videos keep pausing and keyboard keeps going away while typing
content:
Today everytime I try to watch a video, even the one on my device, it just keep pausing randomly. After a few seconds sometimes 3 or 2 or even 1. I make sure not to touch the screen but it still pauses. On top of that I tried recording a video and it kept stopping after a few second on whatsapp but with the camera app it worked fine.
Also while typing on Google search and on Instagram the keyboard keeps disappearing. 

I try to research these issues but other suggestions were for Samsungs and it didn't apply to my phone.
